mapper.select: select rownum rn,docNum,title,name,state,regDate from (select docNum,title,U.name name,state,regDate from DOC_TAB D1 inner join USER_TAB U on D1.send = U.id where D1.storage = '미결' order by regDate desc) where rownum between 0 and 10 order by rn desc

select rownum rn,docNum,title,name,regDate from (select docNum,title,U.name name,regDate from DOC_TAB D1 inner join USER_TAB U on D1.send = U.id where D1.storage = '완결' order by regDate desc) where rownum between 0 and 4 order by rn desc

select rownum rn,docNum,title,name,regDate from (select docNum,title,U.name name,regDate from DOC_TAB D1 inner join USER_TAB U on D1.send = U.id where D1.storage = '임시' order by regDate desc) where rownum between 0 and 4 order by rn desc
select * from( select rownum rn, docNum,title,state,regDate,storage from DOC_TAB where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and rownum <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount})) where rn > ((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})
select count(*) from DOC_TAB where docNum>0
